name.label: Name
name.v8n_too_long: Please choose a name that is 100 characters long or less.

value.label: Value
value.v8n_required: Please provide a value for this custom field.
value.v8n_too_long: Unfortunately we can't store values that are more than 700 characters long.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.helper_text: Whether or not this custom field is visible on the receipt and email receipt. This correlates to custom fields with a "h:" prefix when added to the cart.

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this custom field? You won't be able to bring it back.
